comments.body:
cc @wangyum, after changes applied to HiveTableRelation, we don't modify `tableMeta` any more. 
The converted `LogicalRelation(HadoopFsRelation, xx)` from `HiveTableRelation` will actual get size by `HadoopFsRelation.sizeInBytes`. 

Do you think this is an acceptable change or we should deal with stats differently in `DetermineTableStats`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +139,143 @@        // After SPARK-28573, sizeInBytes should be equal to dataSize.
        val relation1 = spark.table("t1").queryExecution.analyzed.children.head
        assert(relation1.stats.sizeInBytes === dataSize)

        spark.sql("REFRESH TABLE t1")
